faqs.answers: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
A syntax extension for JavaScript, used with React to describe UI elements.

faqs.questions: What is a component in React?
faqs.answers: A reusable piece of the UI.

faqs.questions: What are the types of components in React?

faqs.answers: A JavaScript function that returns JSX.
A JavaScript class that extends React.Component and has a render method.

faqs.questions: What is a state in React?
faqs.answers: An object that holds dynamic data within a component.

faqs.questions: What is a prop in React?
faqs.answers: Short for “properties”, they are read-only inputs passed to a component.

faqs.questions: What is the difference between state and props?
faqs.answers: State is managed within the component, props are passed to the component.
